title: New: Dromes – Only One (ft. X Priest X)
body:
Floridian duo, **X priest X** are causing quite the stir across the inter-web at the moment, particularly with new track _Isn’t It So_.

Fellow Florida based producer **Dromes** has given their previous track _Samurai_ the remix treatment and its quite the listen. The bubblegum pop aesthetic has been cast aside, with Madeline Priest’s vocals scattered loosely throughout this thoroughly dark and electronic affair . This stuff feels like Orlando at 2am. Give it a listen below:
